LanguageData: martenmorph This person has mechanites in their blood that are slowly mutating them into a martenmorph. Keep an eye on them, as leaving the mechanites unattended could lead to them becoming far more marten than human. reeling transforming [PAWN_nameDef] is at risk of transforming into an animal soon. You can use stabilizer to prevent this [PAWN_nameDef] is at risk of fully changing very soon. changing martenmorph partial This person has mechanites in their blood that are providing them with marten-esk mutations. depricated You should not have this hediff, if you do, feel free to ignore it or remove it with dev mode. depricated You should not have this hediff, if you do, feel free to ignore it or remove it with dev mode. depricated You should not have this hediff, if you do, feel free to ignore it or remove it with dev mode. depricated You should not have this hediff, if you do, feel free to ignore it or remove it with dev mode. depricated You should not have this hediff, if you do, feel free to ignore it or remove it with dev mode. This pawn has been stabilised against further mutations. This lasts for five days, and the pawn cannot receive additional mutations in this timeframe. mutagen stabilised mutagen accelerated This pawn's mutations are appearing at an accelerated rate. serum addiction This pawn is now addicted to serums, and will require them on a regular basis. If they go into withdrawal, they may have concerning mental breaks. withdrawal fox fever This pawn has contracted a mutagenic disease that makes them feel much more...foxy. minor major extreme [PAWN_nameDef] is at risk of transforming into an animal soon. In this state, [PAWN_pronoun] can be reverted. sapient mostly sapient conflicted mostly feral mostly feral animalistic Due to certain mutations or having spent time as an animal, this pawn is struggling to maintain their sapience sapient mostly sapient conflicted mostly feral mostly feral <2xMergedHuman.label>2x merged morph</2xMergedHuman.label> <2xMergedHuman.description>[PAWN_defName] is a creature that should never have been, a fusion of two beings which mutated to become one animalistic monstrosity.</2xMergedHuman.description> <2xMergedHuman.stages.0.label>sapient</2xMergedHuman.stages.0.label> <2xMergedHuman.stages.1.label>mostly sapient</2xMergedHuman.stages.1.label> <2xMergedHuman.stages.2.label>conflicted</2xMergedHuman.stages.2.label> <2xMergedHuman.stages.3.label>mostly feral</2xMergedHuman.stages.3.label> <2xMergedHuman.stages.4.label>mostly feral</2xMergedHuman.stages.4.label> permanently feral [PAWN_defName] used to be a human, but the mechanites in [PAWN_possessive] system have forgotten his prior form â€” [PAWN_pronoun] is now sealed in this form for the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life. Reversion serums will not work. was animal [PAWN_defName] was turned into an animal, but [PAWN_pronoun] got better. However, [PAWN_pronoun] is not too happy about it. permanent feral sapient driven mad was melded [PAWN_defName] was joined with another person in a chaotic mash of flesh and flesh, but finds the insight valuable. permanent feral sapient driven mad was melded [PAWN_defName] was joined with another person in a chaotic mash of flesh and flesh, and is scarred from the experience. permanent feral sapient driven mad was animal [PAWN_defName] was turned into an animal, but [PAWN_pronoun] got better. However, [PAWN_pronoun] takes it as a learning opportunity. permanent feral sapient driven mad feralising [PAWN_nameDef]'s sapience is rapidly degrading to an animal level, thanks to the administration of feral pills. This pawn has been stabilised against further mutations. This lasts for five days, and the pawn cannot receive additional mutations in this timeframe. mutagen stabilised initial initial minor moderate serious extreme extreme extreme Having been exposed to high levels of mutagenic mechanites, they are beginning to build up in this pawn's system, which will induce mutations at a high enough concentration. initial initial minor moderate serious extreme extreme extreme Having been exposed to high levels of mutagenic mechanites, they are beginning to build up in this pawn's system, which will induce mutations at a high enough concentration. initial initial minor moderate serious extreme extreme extreme Having been exposed to high levels of mutagenic mechanites, they are beginning to build up in this pawn's system, which will induce mutations at a high enough concentration. Pray to Randy they don't come out the other end on all fours. reeling transforming changing chaomorph partial This person has mechanites in their blood that are providing them with all sorts of mutations. chookmorph This person has mechanites in their blood that are slowly mutating them into a chookmorph. Take care to not let them go without it, as withdrawal symtoms risk them transforming into an animal. withdrawal An implanted sapiostore mesh. milk addiction This person has a developed a dependancy on morph milk. Take care to not let them go without it, as withdrawal symtoms risk them transforming into a cow. withdrawal egg addiction This person has a developed a dependancy on chook eggs. Take care to not let them go without it, as withdrawal symtoms risk them transforming into a chicken. withdrawal
